---

Confirmed: the MutationObserver in `content.js` re-injects buttons on each DOM change (e.g., adding feedback), causing a re-injection loop. Fixing both issues:


---

Improving the MutationObserver to avoid re-injecting while feedback is shown:


---

<details><summary>Tool use: **read_file** • Read file: content.js</summary>

---

The MutationObserver re-injects on every DOM change; feedback adds/removes elements, triggering more injections. Fixing this:


---

<tool-use data-tool-type="write" data-tool-name="search_replace">

<details><summary>Tool use: **code_edit** • Edit file: content.js</summary>

**Chunk 1**
Lines added: 6, lines removed: 1

```diff
@@ -121,6 +121,11 @@
  
  // Re-inject on DOM changes (for dynamically loaded content)
+ let observerTimeout;
  const observer = new MutationObserver(() =&gt; {
-     injectCaptureButtons();
+     // Debounce to prevent excessive re-injections
+     clearTimeout(observerTimeout);
+     observerTimeout = setTimeout(() =&gt; {
+         injectCaptureButtons();
+     }, 100);
  });
  
```

</details>

</tool-use>

---

Debouncing helps, but MutationObserver can still trigger repeated re-injections. Improving the logic:


---

<tool-use data-tool-type="read" data-tool-name="read_file">
<details><summary>Tool use: **read_file** • Read file: content.js</summary>

</details>
</tool-use>

---

Button removal in `injectCaptureButtons()` triggers `remove()` listeners, which can spur re-injection. Re-reading `content.js` to trace the flow:


---

<tool-use data-tool-type="read" data-tool-name="read_file">
<details><summary>Tool use: **read_file** • Read file: content.js</summary>

</details>
</tool-use>

---

Feedback element additions trigger the MutationObserver and re-inject buttons, which can loop. Preventing re-injections for feedback elements (and other extension UI elements):


---

<tool-use data-tool-type="write" data-tool-name="search_replace">

<details><summary>Tool use: **code_edit** • Edit file: content.js</summary>

**Chunk 1**
Lines added: 25, lines removed: 6

```diff
@@ -122,10 +122,29 @@
  // Re-inject on DOM changes (for dynamically loaded content)
  let observerTimeout;
- const observer = new MutationObserver(() =&gt; {
-     // Debounce to prevent excessive re-injections
-     clearTimeout(observerTimeout);
-     observerTimeout = setTimeout(() =&gt; {
-         injectCaptureButtons();
-     }, 100);
+ let isProcessing = false;
+ 
+ const observer = new MutationObserver((mutations) =&gt; {
+     // Ignore mutations that are our own feedback elements or button removals
+     let shouldSkip = false;
+     for (const mutation of mutations) {
+         // Check if the mutation is about our extension elements
+         for (const node of [...(mutation.addedNodes || []), ...(mutation.removedNodes || [])]) {
+             if (node.nodeType === 1 &amp;&amp; (node.classList?.contains(&#39;capthat-feedback&#39;) || node.classList?.contains(&#39;capthat-capture-btn&#39;))) {
+                 shouldSkip = true;
+                 break;
+             }
+         }
+         if (shouldSkip) break;
+     }
+     
+     // Debounce and skip our own mutations to prevent infinite loops
+     if (!shouldSkip &amp;&amp; !isProcessing) {
+         clearTimeout(observerTimeout);
+         observerTimeout = setTimeout(() =&gt; {
+             isProcessing = true;
+             injectCaptureButtons();
+             isProcessing = false;
+         }, 100);
+     }
  });
  
```

</details>

</tool-use>

- Capture button: smaller, circular, bottom-right with "+".

## Changes Made

- Header: `#333333` → `#B2DFDB`; text set to `#2C3E50`.

```diff
      const images = result.capturedImages || [];
      
+     const moodBoard = document.getElementById(&#39;moodBoard&#39;);
+     const minCells = 10; // Show at least 10 cells
+     
+     // Calculate how many cells we need
+     const numCells = Math.max(minCells, images.length);
+     
+     // Create grid cells
+     for (let i = 0; i &lt; numCells; i++) {
+         const cell = document.createElement(&#39;div&#39;);
+         cell.className = &#39;mood-board-cell empty&#39;;
+         cell.dataset.index = i;
+         moodBoard.appendChild(cell);
+     }
+     
+     // Display images in cells
      images.forEach((imageData, index) =&gt; {
-         if (index &lt; 10) {
-             const cell = document.querySelector(&#96;.mood-board-cell[data-index=&quot;${index}&quot;]&#96;);
-             if (cell) {
-                 displayImageInCell(cell, imageData);
-             }
+         const cell = document.querySelector(&#96;.mood-board-cell[data-index=&quot;${index}&quot;]&#96;);
+         if (cell) {
+             displayImageInCell(cell, imageData);
          }
      });
```

</details>

</tool-use>
